          <title>
            <string language="en">Alpha, beta and gamma radiation through a magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alpha-, Beta- und gammastrahlung durch ein 
magnetisches fangen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bêta et gamma rayonnement d'alpha, par un champ 
magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Radiação do alfa, a beta e a gamma através de 
um campo magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Beta e radiazione gamma dell'alfa, attraverso un 
campo magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλφα, βήτα και ακτινοβολία γάμμα μέσω ενός 
μαγνητικού πεδίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radiación de la alfa, beta y gamma a través de 
un campo magnético</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram compares what happens to alpha, beta and gamma radiation when they pass through a magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">beta radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charged particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gamma radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm vergleicht, was Alpha geschieht, 
Beta und gamma Strahlung, wenn sie durch ein magnetisches 
überschreiten, auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme compare ce qui arrive bêta et gamma 
au rayonnement d'alpha, quand elles traversent un champ magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama compara o que acontece à radiação
do alfa, a beta e a gamma quando passa através de um campo 
magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema confronta che cosa accade beta ed a 
radiazione gamma dell'alfa, quando attraversano un campo magnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα συγκρίνει τι συμβαίνει στην άλφα, 
βήτα και ακτινοβολία γάμμα όταν περνούν μέσω ενός μαγνητικού 
πεδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama compara qué sucede a la radiación 
de la alfa, beta y gamma cuando él pasa a través de un campo 
magnético.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Betastrahlung</string>
